snippet.title: Shadow Sorcerer gameplay (PC Game, 1991)
snippet.description:
Introduction and gameplay for Shadow Sorcerer, Dos PC game produced by U.S. Gold in 1991 - http://www.squakenet.com/download/shadow-sorcerer/6000/
Exploring and engaging in combat in this old-school fantasy adventure.
Played through Dosbox emulation platform.
Recorded with original sound.

Similar videos you may like:
The Summoning - https://youtu.be/ozRcWp2GYB8
Dragons of Flame - https://youtu.be/0yyxkdLZmVM
Sorcerer Lord - https://youtu.be/TIatifw2wTU
